createFor(address,(string,uint256)).details: Anyone can create a project on an owner's behalf.

params._metadata: A struct containing metadata content about the project, and domain within which the metadata applies. An empty string is acceptable if no metadata is being provided.
params._owner: The address that will be the owner of the project.

returns._0: The token ID of the newly created project

delegate(address).details: Delegates votes from the sender to `delegatee`.

delegates(address).details: Returns the delegate that `account` has chosen.

getPastTotalSupply(uint256).details: Returns the total supply of votes available at the end of a past block (`blockNumber`). NOTE: This value is the sum of all available votes, which is not necessarily the sum of all delegated votes. Votes that have not been delegated are still part of total supply, even though they would not participate in a vote. Requirements: - `blockNumber` must have been already mined

getPastVotes(address,uint256).details: Returns the amount of votes that `account` had at the end of a past block (`blockNumber`). Requirements: - `blockNumber` must have been already mined

getVotes(address).details: Returns the current amount of votes that `account` has.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setMetadataOf(uint256,(string,uint256)).details: Only a project's owner or operator can set its metadata.

params._metadata: A struct containing metadata content, and domain within which the metadata applies. An empty string is acceptable if no metadata is being provided.
params._projectId: The ID of the project who's metadata is being changed.

params._newResolver: The address of the new resolver.

tokenURI(uint256).details: this is optional for every project

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

count.details: The count is incremented with each new project created.  The resulting ERC-721 token ID for each project is the newly incremented count value.

count().notice: The number of projects that have been created using this contract.

createFor(address,(string,uint256)).notice: Create a new project for the specified owner, which mints an NFT (ERC-721) into their wallet.

metadataContentOf(uint256,uint256).notice: The metadata for each project, which can be used across several domains. _projectId The ID of the project to which the metadata belongs. _domain The domain within which the metadata applies.

setMetadataOf(uint256,(string,uint256)).notice: Allows a project owner to set the project's metadata content for a particular domain namespace.

setTokenUriResolver(address).notice: Set the address of the IJBTokenUriResolver used to retrieve the tokenURI of projects.

tokenURI(uint256).notice: Returns the URI where the ERC-721 standard JSON of a project is hosted.

tokenUriResolver().notice: The contract resolving each project ID to its ERC721 URI.

userdoc.notice: Stores project ownership and identifying information.
